I guess each generation's been tinkering with the place, adding labs, making upgrades and so on.
DIALOGUE AFTER: EnricoThompson: There's some stuff I need to check on. See you around, yeah?

Best part of my day is coming home to my girls.
I love my work, but I love being a father even more.
Power demand jumped another five percent this year.
I'm really sorry about Father... I mean Shaun. I can't imagine losing one of my children.
Maybe you already know this, but... well, Father was very proud of you.
